summary:
Python is a popular and versatile computer programming language. It is easy to read and write due to its simple design and use of spaces and tabs. Python can be used for many different types of programs, from games to scientific tools.

Created by Guido van Rossum, the first version was released in 1991. Over the years, it has been updated with new features, with Python 3 being a significant upgrade. Python is now widely used, especially in machine learning.
title: Python (programming language)
